document_data.mainbody:
Iphigea Evermist was a duergar from the Lower City of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Iphigea had a black skin, typical of most duergar, with white beard and white hair gathered in a ponytail. Iphigea wore a simple set of chainmail armor.
In the , Iphigea Evermist, along with other duergar, giant spiders, and drow, was slaughtered in the home of Bloomridge Park groundskeeper, Lavernica. The murder spree was performed by Orin the Red and her Murder Tribunal of Bhaal.
